subject: Books and Literature
Fantasy Sports
lead_paragraph: Before fantasy sports was a multibillion-dollar industry, Matthew Berry was finding his voice as the Talented Mr. Roto. Now he’s a leading voice as ESPN’s senior fantasy sports analyst.
